entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kouchibouguac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 08:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -18.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -19.9°C
Wind: SW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
